original_text: Someone might say: ‘So we have a new life because God is kind to us. God's Law that he gave to Moses does not rule us any more. Then maybe we should continue to do wrong things. It will not make any difference.’ No, that is not true!
korean_text: 그런즉 어찌하리요 우리가 법 아래에 있지 아니하고 은혜 아래에 있으니 죄를 지으리요 그럴 수 없느니라

sentences.original_text: So we have a new life
because God is kind to us.
God's Law that he gave to Moses
does not rule us any more.
Then maybe we should continue to do wrong things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 아마 우리는 계속해서 잘못된 일을 해야 할지도 모릅니다.

sentences.original_text: It will not make any difference.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 아무런 차이도 만들지 않을 것입니다.
